enGB: Feral kitstune are the savage counterparts to their more civilized kin, caring more about strength and survival than scholarly pursuits. These kitsune gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, and -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}. This racial {g|Encyclopedia:Trait}trait{/g} alters the kitsune's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} modifiers.'

Exotic Warrior adds {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} to the list of her class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. She also becomes proficient with light armor and elven curved blades.
If the character already has the class skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiency{/g} or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a -1 Armor {g|Encyclopedia:Check}Check{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Penalty{/g} reduction in case of armor proficiency.

Some fighters, hailing from distant lands, focus on using speed in combination with their {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}two-handed{/g} curved blades to outmaneuver and overpower their enemies. While their teachings are physically and mentally demanding, no one can deny the deadly effiency of its tenants.
